hooks.command: INPUT=$(cat); if printf '%s' "$INPUT" | jq -e '.stop_hook_active' 2>/dev/null | grep -q true; then exit 0; fi; echo 'Check: (1) Does ## Requirements in CLAUDE.md need updating or creating? (functional and cross-functional requirements that document what the system does and how it behaves) (2) Does ## Mental Model in CLAUDE.md need updating or creating? (how the system works — key concepts, domain objects, architecture, relationships, lifecycle) (3) Does the rest of CLAUDE.md need updating? (how to work in this system — procedures, rules, conventions). Update whichever need it. If none, reply only with 0.' >&2; exit 2
